oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sonny James interview - Biff Collie Nashville House Party - 1976-07-27
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Recording of an interview with Sonny James (performer), conducted by Biff Collie on Nashville House Party on July 27, 1976.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Biff Collie introduces Sonny James -- Sonny James talks about being from Hackleburg, Tennessee -- Sonny James talks about his record Running Bears -- Sonny James talks with the audience about where they are from -- James talks about touring in Canada -- James takes questions from the audience -- James talks about why he has a beard -- James talks about how long he has been in the music business -- James talks about receiving strange fan mail -- James talks about his gold records -- James talks about the last thing he does before he goes to sleep at night is using the hotel bed massager -- James talks about how much he works -- James talks about the biggest fish he has ever caught, an 8 pound bass -- James talks about his fans being his driving factor -- James talks about his favorite guitars and all the people he has met as a performer -- James talks about enjoying sports and wood work -- Biff Collie introduces Sonny James -- James talks about what records he would play if he was a disc jockey -- Biff Collie introduces Sonny James -- James talks about the funniest story he has ever heard, in which he fell through a stage -- James and a female audience member perform a skit -- James agrees to play a tune -- James talks about Tammy Wynette -- Biff Collie concludes the interview
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Collie, Biff; James, Sonny;
